devdoc.author: https://github.com/holographxyz
devdoc.details: Use this to: validate that contracts are Holograph Protocol compliant, get source code for supported standards, and interact with hTokens

constructor.details: Constructor is left empty and init is used instead

getContractTypeAddress(bytes32).details: Returns the contract address for a contract type

getHToken(uint32).details: Returns the hToken address for a given chain id

getHolograph().details: This contract stores a reference to all the primary modules and variables of the protocol

params.index: The index to start enumeration from

returns.contracts: address[] Returns a set length array of holographable contracts deployed

getHolographedHashAddress(bytes32).details: Returns the address for a holographed hash

getReservedContractTypeAddress(bytes32).details: Returns the reserved contract address for a contract type

getUtilityToken().details: This is the official utility token of the Holograph Protocol

init(bytes).details: This function is called by the deployer/factory when creating a contract

params.initPayload: abi encoded payload to use for contract initilaization

referenceContractTypeAddress(address).details: Allows to reference a deployed smart contract, and use it's code as reference inside of Holographers

setContractTypeAddress(bytes32,address).details: Sets the contract address for a contract type

setHToken(uint32,address).details: Sets the hToken address for a specific chain id

params.holograph: address of the Holograph Protocol smart contract to use

setHolographedHashAddress(bytes32,addres.details: Allows Holograph Factory to register a deployed contract, referenced with deployment hash

setReservedContractTypeAddress(bytes32,b.details: Allows admin to update or toggle reserved type

setReservedContractTypeAddresses(bytes32.details: Allows admin to update or toggle reserved types

params.utilityToken: address of the Holograph Utility Token smart contract to use

_contractTypeAddresses.details: Storage slot for saving contract type to contract address references

_hTokens.details: Mapping of all hTokens available for the different EVM chains

_holographableContracts.details: Array of all Holographable contracts that were ever deployed on this chain

_holographedContracts.details: A list of smart contracts that are guaranteed secure and holographable

_holographedContractsHashMap.details: A mapping of hashes to contract addresses

_reservedTypes.details: Reserved type addresses for Admin  Note: this is used for defining default contracts

devdoc.title: Holograph Registry

getHolographableContracts(uint256,uint25.notice: Get set length list, starting from index, for all holographable contracts

getHolographableContractsLength().notice: Get total number of deployed holographable contracts

getUtilityToken().notice: Get the Holograph Utility Token address

init(bytes).notice: Used internally to initialize the contract instead of through a constructor

setHolograph(address).notice: Update the Holograph Protocol contract address

setUtilityToken(address).notice: Update the Holograph Utility Token address

userdoc.notice: View and validate all deployed holographable contracts
